definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: I'm A-Ok. I heard that you are visiting NYC next month, why?
sentences.chinese: 我還行。聽說你下個月要去紐約了，爲什麼？

sentences.english: The ambassador-designate will assume duty next month.
sentences.chinese: 這位派定的大使將在下個月就職。

sentences.english: Militant mineworkers in the Ukraine have voted for a one-day stoppage next month.
sentences.chinese: 烏克蘭激進的礦工們已經投票決定下個月罷工一天。

sentences.english: My company asked me to do a dog-and-pony show about the new product in the exhibition next month.
sentences.chinese: 公司讓我下個月在博覽會上做一個新產品的展示。

sentences.english: My high school is having its twentieth reunion next month.
sentences.chinese: 我的高中母校下個月舉辦二十週年同學會。

sentences.english: She is due to give birth to her first child with Prince William next month.
sentences.chinese: 她將在下個月分娩與威廉王子的第一個孩子。

sentences.english: Next month they plan to stage a body burning in a light aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 下個月他們還將在一架輕型飛機上做屍體燃燒試驗。

sentences.english: That store is moving to a new location next month.
sentences.chinese: 那家店下個月就要搬到一個更好的地方去了。

sentences.english: I leave for Germany⑾ on the 11th of next month.
sentences.chinese: 我下個月十一號去德國。

sentences.english: Jackson was due to start a series of comeback concerts in London next month.
sentences.chinese: 傑克遜原本在下個月的倫敦開始一系列的迴歸音樂會。

sentences.english: We'll take part in a regatta next month.
sentences.chinese: 下個月我們將參加一場划船比賽。

sentences.english: I have to pay next month's rent.
sentences.chinese: 我還得付下個月的房租。

sentences.english: The building to be built next month will be a hospital.
sentences.chinese: 下個月要建的那座樓將用作醫院。

sentences.english: Their rock band is going to record their first record next month.
sentences.chinese: 下個月她們的搖滾樂團將灌錄她們的第一張唱片。

sentences.english: Will you lend me ￡5? I will pay you back next month.
sentences.chinese: 借給我五英鎊錢好嗎？我下個月還你。

sentences.english: I will be working in the department store next month.
sentences.chinese: 下個月我將在這個百貨大樓裏上班。

definition: preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
to return to one's home country
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
